page.title: 13GENERAL IMPRESSIONS
page.content:
{GENERAL IMPRESSIONS.}
We talked to people.Most people agree with conservation because the buildings around here are old and they think the place should not be spoiled.Most people have their own transport because the bus service is poor.Everyone likes the area but they wish there was a better bus service and a shop and that the aeroplanes did not fly so low.There are retired people and young people and they all say much the same. The older people use the buses which go to Dunbar and Haddington on Saturdays ,and they use the Tuesday afternoon bus to Dunbar. On other days they can travel to Dunbar on the school bus but that is only in term time.{GENERAL IMPRESSIONS {IS CONTINUED ON PAGE 14.
